setDestination

public long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.math.ITransformation numericalGoalRepresentation)
Description copied from interface: ISmartServoRuntime
Set the numerical destination.

In default, the reference is "World". If the frame was modified/ changed/ attached with the function setRealtimeDestination(Frame) the reference frame will be w.r.t those settings.

Note: setDestination() calls internally IServoRuntime.updateWithRealtimeSystem().

Specified by:
setDestination in interface ISmartServoRuntime
Parameters:
numericalGoalRepresentation - transformation of the Goal
Returns:
timestamp in milliseconds

setDestination

public long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.AbstractFrame newGoal)
Description copied from interface: IServoRuntime
Set a new cartesian frame as destination.

The reference system is the parent of the given frame.
Note: Calls IServoRuntime.updateWithRealtimeSystem() internally.

Specified by:
setDestination in interface IServoRuntime
Specified by:
setDestination in class ServoDataSource
Parameters:
newGoal - the destination frame
Returns:
timestamp in milliseconds
